orinoco
Interface TextMacro

All Known Implementing Classes:
PageNumber, orinoco.layout.PageNumberMacro
public interface TextMacro

The interface to be implemented by text macros

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getText()
          Gets the dynamic text for this macro.
 

Method Detail

getText

public java.lang.String getText()
Gets the dynamic text for this macro. If this does not vary significantly over the course of a document, then perhaps the use of a text macro is not the correct choice

Returns:
the text to be included
